data.message:
"That's why we sing for these kids, who don't have a thing
Except for a dream, and a fuckin' rap magazine
Who post pin-up pictures on their walls all day long
Idolize they favorite rappers and know all they songs
Or for anyone who's ever been through shit in their lives
'Til they sit and they cry at night wishin' they'd die
'Til they throw on a rap record and they sit, and they vibe
We're nothin' to you but we're the fuckin' shit in they eyes
That's why we seize the moment try to freeze it and own it, squeeze it and hold it
'Cause we consider these minutes golden
And maybe they'll admit it when we're gone
Just let our spirits live on, through our lyrics that you hear in our
Songs and we can...

Sing for the moment"

replies.message: His best track!
Mockingbird..
This was a real great track.  Not that ft Beyoncé shit

Hes not hungry anymore luckily us fans who were there from the beginning have memories of the real rap god.
This new track is awful
Unfortunately he dont rap like that anymore. He went way down hill
That song was crazy. Probably my fav track by him

Thank you Chelsea Rose Williams. It really is. Hebstarted dumbing himself fown to sell albums. Thats what the issue is. Dre said it on my darling "i dont know it just seems like ever since you got off the, drugs you became a lot softer"... 100% facts. His music is not the same. Its not as deep as it used to be. Not its just for likes.. The same shiy he complained about in syllables
Maksim Gudkov it's sing for the moment you Muppet
That took you a while to write that down

Steven he nearly overdosed on drugs so many times and went through lawsuits with his mother and his ex, its a pretty bad thing but by the sounds of it you would rather a guy who has fuck all to live for and is always angry and depressed so he makes better content?? You aren't a true fan, a true fan is someone who is supportive from the beginning, all the way to the end, no matter how it changes over the years
One of his best songs
His best songs are Headlights, Love The Way You Lie (classic) and I need a doctor (in my opinion). I love his slim shady songs too
Steven Dominick he made encore while he was on drugs and that was his worst album ever
This new track is him being real, life changes, it never stays the same, and you should know that Chelsea, he's always stayed real.
One of his best ❤️❤️ Fady Yasser Ramy Ashraf
One of my all time favs 🔥😍
